text: Elisha Levy (; born on 18 November 1957 in Jerusalem) is a former professional football player. == Player == Levy played in Hapoel Hapoel Beit Sha'an youth team from 1968 to 1974. After playing in Hapoel Beit Sha'an youth team, Elisha Levy was playing for Hapoel Beit Sha'an from 1974 to 1982. For 1 year, 1982-1983, Elisha Levy was played for Maccabi Haifa. In 1983-1987, Levy played in Maccabi Petah Tikva Elisha Levy was playing for Hapoel Beit Sha'an at 1987-1989. Elisha Levy was retired from football after two years in Hapoel Beit Sha'an. ==Manager== Levy managed teams for 20 years. Currently, Elisha Levy manages Maccabi Haifa. title: Elisha Levy
